name: Sergey Sivtsov
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience building enterprise web applications. Expertise in .NET ecosystem, modern JavaScript frameworks (React, Angular, Next.js), and cloud platforms (Azure, AWS). Passionate about clean code, scalable architecture, and delivering high-quality solutions.
skillsSummary: Strong expertise in designing and implementing enterprise applications using .NET ecosystem
Proficient in modern development practices including TDD, CI/CD, and microservices architecture
Experienced in data ETL implementation and database optimization
Proven track record working with Agile (Scrum) methodology
Skilled in Azure DevOps for build automation and deployment pipelines
Hands-on experience with Azure and AWS cloud services
Strong analytical, communication, and problem-solving skills

projects.projectOverview: A Resident Experience Platform for property management companies that provides managed resident benefits packages including renters insurance, credit building, air filter delivery, and pest control services.
responsibilities: Developing new features for resident benefits platform
Implementing backend services and REST APIs for property management workflows
Building responsive UI components and integrating with third-party services
Collaborating with international team in Agile environment

projects.projectOverview: An innovative online credit solutions provide immediate relief to customers today and help them build a brighter financial future.
responsibilities: Conducted code auditing and performance optimization
Developed serverless Azure Functions for business-critical workflows
Integrated with Plaid API for secure bank connections
Configured CI/CD pipelines and deployment environments
Collaborated with distributed international team

projects.projectName: A Groundbreaking AdTech Automation Platform for the TV Space
projects.projectOverview: An innovative ad tech platform encompassing data-driven, automated solutions and services designed to greatly facilitate the buying and selling of advertising in the TV space. The system acts as a unified, end-to-end TV ad marketplace aiming to bring together advertisers, buyers, and TV stations across the United States. The platform offers real-time information on avails, seamless integration with Mediaocean and Strata, transparent order placement, validation, and management, and sophisticated reporting for 100% process transparency.
responsibilities: Estimating tasks
Implementation of business logic on backend as well as frontend using cutting-edge technologies
Developing of gRPC services
Code review and refactoring, bug fixing
Writing unit and automated tests
Creating builds, setting up environments, configuring deployments
Integration with OKTA (single sign-on solution)
Communication with a customer on a daily basis

projectExpirience.title: .NET Software Engineer
projectExpirience.description: Worked as a .NET Developer on enterprise applications for a major US insurance company. Developed and maintained web applications and desktop solutions using ASP.NET, WCF, WinForms and Oracle DB. Responsibilities included implementing business logic, creating integrations with partner systems, developing plugins for internal applications, and optimizing database operations. Technologies: ASP.NET, WCF, WinForms, ADO.NET, Oracle DB, DevExpress.

projects.projectOverview: Concierge is a special service to assist customers with all aspect of Worker Compensation claim. The application gives ability to create new requests with different medical service, search/filtering requests. The main page of application has many dynamic forms that loaded depending on the user actions. This functionality works on AJAX callbacks.
responsibilities: Estimated tasks and provided technical assessments
Implemented business logic for system components
Created dynamic UI panels with AJAX functionality
Developed validation mechanisms
Implemented Direct Read/Write integration between partner systems
Built modules to integrate application with external services

projects.projectOverview: The purpose of the project is to help with processing emails and faxes like Outlook.
responsibilities: Estimated tasks and created project plans
Implemented business requirements and core functionality
Developed optimized counting functionality for folder records
Implemented email reply/forward actions
Created LDAP address book and IMAP collector
Added support for embedded attachments
Developed ownership and access control functionality
Built plugins for integration with other applications
Implemented backup mechanism using Oracle Advanced Queuing for fault-tolerant record recovery across load-balanced services

projects.title: .NET Software Engineer
projects.projectOverview: ECH Agent is an application that serves for interception of incoming calls through Avaya Softphone, retrieving the UUI from a phone call and provide more detailed information about the caller to other internal applications.
responsibilities: Implementing the part responsible for intercepting calls
Creating plugins for integration with internal applications
